00360 
00361 /*---- Logging initialization --------------------------------------*/
00362 
00363 void logger_init()
00364 {
00365    INT size, status;
00366    BOOL flag;
00367    HNDLE hKey;
00368    char str[256];
00369 
00370    /*---- create /logger entries -----*/
00371 
00372    cm_get_path(str);
00373    size = sizeof(str);
00374    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Data dir", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00375 
00376    strcpy(str, "midas.log");
00377    size = sizeof(str);
00378    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Message file", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00379 
00380    size = sizeof(BOOL);
00381    flag = TRUE;
00382    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Write data", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00383 
00384    flag = FALSE;
00385    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/ODB Dump", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00386 
00387    strcpy(str, "run%05d.odb");
00388    size = sizeof(str);
00389    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/ODB Dump File", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00390 
00391    flag = FALSE;
00392    size = sizeof(BOOL);
00393    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Auto restart", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00394 
00395    flag = TRUE;
00396    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Tape message", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00397 
00398    /* create at least one logging channel */
00399    status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Channels/0", &hKey);
00400    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00401       /* if no channels are defined, define at least one */
00402       status = db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Channels/0", strcomb(chn_settings_str));
00403       if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
00404          cm_msg(MERROR, "logger_init", "Cannot create channel entry in database");
00405    }
00406 #ifdef HAVE_MYSQL
00407    create_sql_tree();
00408 #endif
00409 }
00410 
00411 /*---- ODB dump routine --------------------------------------------*/
00412 
00413 void log_odb_dump(LOG_CHN * log_chn, short int event_id, INT run_number)
00414 {
00415    INT status, buffer_size, size;
00416    EVENT_HEADER *pevent;
00417 
00418    /* write ODB dump */
00419    buffer_size = 10000;
00420    do {
00421       pevent = (EVENT_HEADER *) malloc(buffer_size);
00422       if (pevent == NULL) {
00423          cm_msg(MERROR, "log_odb_dump", "Cannot allocate ODB dump buffer");
00424          break;
00425       }
00426 
00427       size = buffer_size - sizeof(EVENT_HEADER);
00428       status = db_copy(hDB, 0, (char *) (pevent + 1), &size, "");
00429       if (status != DB_TRUNCATED) {
00430          bm_compose_event(pevent, event_id, MIDAS_MAGIC,
00431                           buffer_size - sizeof(EVENT_HEADER) - size + 1, run_number);
00432          log_write(log_chn, pevent);
00433          free(pevent);
00434          break;
00435       }
00436 
00437       /* increase buffer size if truncated */
00438       free(pevent);
00439       buffer_size *= 2;
00440    } while (1);
00441 }
00442 
00443 /*---- ODB save routine --------------------------------------------*/
00444 
00445 void odb_save(char *filename)
00446 {
00447    int size;
00448    char dir[256];
00449    char path[256];
00450 
00451    if (strchr(filename, DIR_SEPARATOR) == NULL) {
00452       size = sizeof(dir);
00453       dir[0] = 0;
00454       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Data Dir", dir, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00455       if (dir[0] != 0)
00456          if (dir[strlen(dir) - 1] != DIR_SEPARATOR)
00457             strcat(dir, DIR_SEPARATOR_STR);
00458       strcpy(path, dir);
00459       strcat(path, filename);
00460    } else
00461       strcpy(path, filename);
00462 
00463    db_save(hDB, 0, path, FALSE);
00464 }

00471 /*---- Convert ctime() type date/time to SQL 'datetime' -------------*/
00472 
00473 typedef struct {
00474    char column_name[NAME_LENGTH];
00475    char column_type[NAME_LENGTH];
00476    char data[256];
00477 } SQL_LIST;
00478 
00479 char *mname[] = {
00480    "January",
00481    "February",
00482    "March",
00483    "April",
00484    "May",
00485    "June",
00486    "July",
00487    "August",
00488    "September",
00489    "October",
00490    "November",
00491    "December"
00492 };
00493 
00494 void ctime_to_datetime(char *date)
00495 {
00496    char ctime_date[30];
00497    struct tm tms;
00498    int i;
00499 
00500    strlcpy(ctime_date, date, sizeof(ctime_date));
00501    memset(&tms, 0, sizeof(struct tm));
00502 
00503    for (i = 0; i < 12; i++)
00504       if (strncmp(ctime_date + 4, mname[i], 3) == 0)
00505          break;
00506    tms.tm_mon = i;
00507 
00508    tms.tm_mday = atoi(ctime_date + 8);
00509    tms.tm_hour = atoi(ctime_date + 11);
00510    tms.tm_min = atoi(ctime_date + 14);
00511    tms.tm_sec = atoi(ctime_date + 17);
00512    tms.tm_year = atoi(ctime_date + 20) - 1900;
00513    tms.tm_isdst = -1;
00514 
00515    if (tms.tm_year < 90)
00516       tms.tm_year += 100;
00517 
00518    mktime(&tms);
00519    sprintf(date, "%d-%02d-%02d %02d-%02d-%02d", 
00520       tms.tm_year+1900, tms.tm_mon+1, tms.tm_mday,
00521       tms.tm_hour, tms.tm_min, tms.tm_sec);
00522 }
00523 
00524 /*---- mySQL debugging output --------------------------------------*/
00525 
00526 int mysql_query_debug(MYSQL *db, char *query)
00527 {
00528    int status;
00529 
00530    /* comment in these lines if you need debugging output
00531    printf("\nSQL query: %s\n", query); 
00532    */
00533    
00534    status = mysql_query(db, query);
00535    
00536    /*
00537    if (status)
00538       printf("SQL error: %s\n", mysql_error(db));
00539    */
00540    return status;
00541 }
00542 
00543 /*---- Retrieve list of columns from ODB tree ----------------------*/
00544 
00545 int sql_get_columns(HNDLE hKeyRoot, SQL_LIST **sql_list)
00546 {
00547    HNDLE hKey;
00548    int   n, i, size, status;
00549    KEY   key;
00550    char  str[256], data[256];
00551 
00552    for (i=0 ; ; i++) {
00553       status = db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyRoot, i, &hKey);
00554       if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
00555          break;
00556    }
00557 
00558    if (i == 0)
00559       return 0;
00560 
00561    n = i;
00562 
00563    *sql_list = (SQL_LIST *)malloc(sizeof(SQL_LIST)*n);
00564 
00565    for (i=0 ; i<n ; i++) {
00566 
00567       /* get name of link, NOT of link target */
00568       db_enum_link(hDB, hKeyRoot, i, &hKey);
00569       db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
00570       strlcpy((*sql_list)[i].column_name, key.name, NAME_LENGTH);
00571 
00572       /* get key */
00573       db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyRoot, i, &hKey);
00574       db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
00575       
00576       /* get key data */
00577       size = sizeof(data);
00578       db_get_data(hDB, hKey, data, &size, key.type);
00579       db_sprintf(str, data, size, 0, key.type);
00580       strcpy((*sql_list)[i].data, str);
00581 
00582       if (key.type == TID_STRING) {
00583          /* check if string is date/time */
00584          if (strlen(str) == 24 && str[10] == ' ' && str[13] == ':') {
00585             strcpy(str, "DATETIME");
00586             ctime_to_datetime((*sql_list)[i].data);
00587          } else
00588             sprintf(str, "VARCHAR (%d)", key.item_size);
00589 
00590       } else {
00591          switch (key.type) {
00592             case TID_BYTE: strcpy(str, "TINYINT UNSIGNED "); break;
00593             case TID_SBYTE: strcpy(str, "TINYINT  "); break;
00594             case TID_CHAR: strcpy(str, "CHAR "); break;
00595             case TID_WORD: strcpy(str, "SMALLINT UNSIGNED "); break;
00596             case TID_SHORT: strcpy(str, "SMALLINT "); break;
00597             case TID_DWORD: strcpy(str, "INT UNSIGNED "); break;
00598             case TID_INT: strcpy(str, "INT "); break;
00599             case TID_BOOL: strcpy(str, "BOOLEAN "); break;
00600             case TID_FLOAT: strcpy(str, "FLOAT "); break;
00601             case TID_DOUBLE: strcpy(str, "DOUBLE "); break;
00602             default: 
00603                cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_create_database", "No SQL type mapping for key \"%s\" of type %s", 
00604                   key.name, rpc_tid_name(key.type));
00605          }
00606       }
00607 
00608       strcpy((*sql_list)[i].column_type, str);
00609    }
00610 
00611    return n;
00612 }
00613 
00614 /*---- Create mySQL table from ODB tree ----------------------------*/
00615 
00616 BOOL sql_create_table(MYSQL *db, char *database, char *table, HNDLE hKeyRoot)
00617 {
00618 char     str[256], query[5000];
00619 int      i, n_col;
00620 SQL_LIST *sql_list;
00621 
00622    sprintf(query, "CREATE TABLE `%s`.`%s` (", database, table);
00623 
00624    n_col = sql_get_columns(hKeyRoot, &sql_list);
00625    if (n_col==0) {
00626       db_get_path(hDB, hKeyRoot, str, sizeof(str));
00627       cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_create_database", "ODB tree \"%s\" contains no variables", str);
00628       return FALSE;
00629    }
00630 
00631    for (i=0 ; i<n_col ; i++)
00632       sprintf(query+strlen(query), "`%s` %s, ", sql_list[i].column_name, sql_list[i].column_type);
00633       
00634    sprintf(query+strlen(query), "PRIMARY KEY (`%s`))", sql_list[0].column_name);
00635    free(sql_list);
00636 
00637    if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00638       cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_create_table", "Failed to create table: Error: %s",              
00639             mysql_error(db));
00640       return FALSE;
00641    }
00642 
00643    return TRUE;
00644 }
00645 
00646 /*---- Create mySQL table from ODB tree ----------------------------*/
00647 
00648 BOOL sql_modify_table(MYSQL *db, char *database, char *table, HNDLE hKeyRoot)
00649 {
00650 char     str[256], query[5000];
00651 int      i, n_col;
00652 SQL_LIST *sql_list;
00653 
00654    n_col = sql_get_columns(hKeyRoot, &sql_list);
00655    if (n_col==0) {
00656       db_get_path(hDB, hKeyRoot, str, sizeof(str));
00657       cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_modify_table", "ODB tree \"%s\" contains no variables", str);
00658       return FALSE;
00659    }
00660 
00661    for (i=0 ; i<n_col ; i++) {
00662 
00663       /* try to add column */
00664       if (i==0)
00665          sprintf(query, "ALTER TABLE `%s`.`%s` ADD `%s` %s", 
00666             database, table, sql_list[i].column_name, sql_list[i].column_type);
00667       else
00668          sprintf(query, "ALTER TABLE `%s`.`%s` ADD `%s` %s AFTER `%s`",
00669             database, table, sql_list[i].column_name, sql_list[i].column_type, sql_list[i-1].column_name);
00670 
00671       if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00672          if (mysql_errno(db) == ER_DUP_FIELDNAME) {
00673 
00674             /* try to modify column */
00675             sprintf(query, "ALTER TABLE `%s`.`%s` MODIFY `%s` %s", 
00676                database, table, sql_list[i].column_name, sql_list[i].column_type);
00677 
00678             if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00679                free(sql_list);
00680                cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_modify_table", "Failed to modify column: Error: %s",              
00681                      mysql_error(db));
00682                return FALSE;
00683             }
00684 
00685          } else {
00686             free(sql_list);
00687             cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_modify_table", "Failed to add column: Error: %s",              
00688                   mysql_error(db));
00689             return FALSE;
00690          }
00691       }
00692    }
00693 
00694    return TRUE;
00695 }
00696 
00697 /*---- Create mySQL database ---------------------------------------*/
00698 
00699 BOOL sql_create_database(MYSQL *db, char *database)
00700 {
00701 char  query[256];
00702 
00703    sprintf(query, "CREATE DATABASE `%s`", database);
00704    if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00705       cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_create_database", "Failed to create database: Error: %s",              
00706             mysql_error(db));
00707       return FALSE;
00708    }
00709 
00710    /* select database */
00711    sprintf(query, "USE `%s`", database);
00712    if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00713       cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_create_database", "Failed to select database: Error: %s",              
00714             mysql_error(db));
00715       return FALSE;
00716    }
00717 
00718    return TRUE;
00719 }
00720 
00721 /*---- Insert table row from ODB tree -------------------------------*/
00722 
00723 int sql_insert(MYSQL *db, char *database, char *table, HNDLE hKeyRoot, BOOL create_flag)
00724 {
00725 char      query[5000];
00726 int       status, i, n_col;
00727 SQL_LIST *sql_list;
00728 
00729    /* 
00730      build SQL query in the form 
00731        "INSERT INTO `<table>` (`<name>`, <name`,..) VALUES (`<value>`, `value`, ...) 
00732    */ 
00733    sprintf(query, "INSERT INTO `%s`.`%s` (", database, table);
00734    n_col = sql_get_columns(hKeyRoot, &sql_list);
00735    if (n_col == 0)
00736       return DB_SUCCESS;
00737    
00738    for (i=0 ; i<n_col ; i++) {
00739       sprintf(query+strlen(query), "`%s`", sql_list[i].column_name);
00740       if (i<n_col-1)
00741          strcat(query, ", ");
00742    }
00743 
00744    strlcat(query, ") VALUES (", sizeof(query));
00745 
00746    for (i=0 ; i<n_col ; i++) {
00747       sprintf(query+strlen(query), "'%s'", sql_list[i].data);
00748       if (i<n_col-1)
00749          strcat(query, ", ");
00750    }
00751 
00752    free(sql_list);
00753    strlcat(query, ")", sizeof(query));
00754    if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00755       
00756       /* if entry for this run exists alreay return */
00757       if (mysql_errno(db) == ER_DUP_ENTRY) {
00758          
00759          return ER_DUP_ENTRY;
00760 
00761       } else if (mysql_errno(db) == ER_NO_SUCH_TABLE && create_flag) {
00762 
00763          /* if table does not exist, creat it and try again */
00764          sql_create_table(db, database, table, hKeyRoot);
00765          if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00766             cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_insert", "Failed to update database: Error: %s",              
00767                   mysql_error(db));
00768             return mysql_errno(db);
00769          }
00770       } else if (mysql_errno(db) == ER_BAD_FIELD_ERROR && create_flag) {
00771 
00772          /* if table structure is different, adjust it and try again */
00773          sql_modify_table(db, database, table, hKeyRoot);
00774          if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00775             cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_insert", "Failed to update database: Error: %s",              
00776                   mysql_error(db));
00777             return mysql_errno(db);
00778          }
00779 
00780       } else {
00781          status = mysql_errno(db);
00782          cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_insert", "Failed to update database: Error: %s",              
00783                mysql_error(db));
00784          return mysql_errno(db);
00785       }
00786    }
00787 
00788    return DB_SUCCESS;
00789 }
00790 
00791 /*---- Update table row from ODB tree ------------------------------*/
00792 
00793 int sql_update(MYSQL *db, char *database, char *table, HNDLE hKeyRoot, BOOL create_flag, char *where)
00794 {
00795 char      query[5000];
00796 int       i, n_col;
00797 SQL_LIST *sql_list;
00798 
00799    /* 
00800    build SQL query in the form 
00801       "UPDATE `<database`.`<table>` SET `<name>`='<value', ... WHERE `<name>`='value' 
00802    */ 
00803    
00804    sprintf(query, "UPDATE `%s`.`%s` SET ", database, table);
00805    n_col = sql_get_columns(hKeyRoot, &sql_list);
00806    if (n_col == 0)
00807       return DB_SUCCESS;
00808 
00809    for (i=0 ; i<n_col ; i++) {
00810       sprintf(query+strlen(query), "`%s`='%s'", sql_list[i].column_name, sql_list[i].data);
00811       if (i<n_col-1)
00812          strcat(query, ", ");
00813    }
00814    free(sql_list);
00815 
00816    sprintf(query+strlen(query), " %s", where);
00817    if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00818       if (mysql_errno(db) == ER_NO_SUCH_TABLE && create_flag) {
00819 
00820          /* if table does not exist, creat it and try again */
00821          sql_create_table(db, database, table, hKeyRoot);
00822          return sql_insert(db, database, table, hKeyRoot, create_flag);
00823          
00824       } else if (mysql_errno(db) == ER_BAD_FIELD_ERROR && create_flag) {
00825 
00826          /* if table structure is different, adjust it and try again */
00827          sql_modify_table(db, database, table, hKeyRoot);
00828          if (mysql_query_debug(db, query)) {
00829             cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_update", "Failed to update database: Error: %s",              
00830                   mysql_error(db));
00831             return mysql_errno(db);
00832          }
00833 
00834       } else {
00835          cm_msg(MERROR, "sql_update", "Failed to update database: Error: %s",              
00836                mysql_error(db));
00837          return mysql_errno(db);
00838       }
00839    }
00840 
00841    return DB_SUCCESS;
00842 }
00843 
00844 /*---- Write ODB tree to SQL table ----------------------------------*/
00845 
00846 void create_sql_tree()
00847 {
00848 char  hostname[80], username[80], password[80], database[80], table[80];
00849 int   size, write_flag, create_flag;
00850 HNDLE hKeyRoot, hKey;
00851 
00852    size = sizeof(create_flag);
00853    create_flag = 0;
00854    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Create database", &create_flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00855 
00856    size = sizeof(write_flag);
00857    write_flag = 0;
00858    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Write data", &write_flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00859 
00860    size = sizeof(hostname);
00861    strcpy(hostname, "localhost");
00862    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Hostname", hostname, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00863 
00864    size = sizeof(username);
00865    strcpy(username, "root");
00866    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Username", username, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00867 
00868    size = sizeof(password);
00869    password[0] = 0;
00870    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Password", password, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00871 
00872    /* use experiment name as default database name */
00873    size = sizeof(database);
00874    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Name", database, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00875    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Database", database, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00876 
00877    size = sizeof(table);
00878    strcpy(table, "Runlog");
00879    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Table", table, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00880 
00881    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links BOR", &hKeyRoot);
00882    if (!hKeyRoot) {
00883       /* create some default links */
00884       db_create_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links BOR", TID_KEY);
00885 
00886       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Run number", &hKey) ==
00887           DB_SUCCESS)
00888          db_create_link(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links BOR/Run number",
00889                         "/Runinfo/Run number");
00890 
00891       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Run parameters/Comment", &hKey) ==
00892           DB_SUCCESS)
00893          db_create_link(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links BOR/Comment",
00894                         "/Experiment/Run parameters/Comment");
00895 
00896       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Start time", &hKey) ==
00897           DB_SUCCESS)
00898          db_create_link(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links BOR/Start time",
00899                         "/Runinfo/Start time");
00900    }
00901 
00902    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links EOR", &hKeyRoot);
00903    if (!hKeyRoot) {
00904       /* create some default links */
00905       db_create_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links EOR", TID_KEY);
00906 
00907       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Stop time", &hKey) ==
00908           DB_SUCCESS)
00909          db_create_link(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links EOR/Stop time",
00910                         "/Runinfo/Stop time");
00911 
00912       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Equipment/Trigger/Statistics/Events sent", &hKey) ==
00913           DB_SUCCESS)
00914          db_create_link(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links EOR/Number of events",
00915                         "/Equipment/Trigger/Statistics/Events sent");
00916 
00917    }
00918 }
00919 
00920 /*---- Write ODB tree to SQL table ----------------------------------*/
00921                                    
00922 void write_sql(BOOL bor)
00923 {
00924 MYSQL db;
00925 char  hostname[80], username[80], password[80], database[80], table[80],
00926       query[5000], where[500];
00927 int   status, size, write_flag, create_flag;
00928 BOOL  insert;
00929 HNDLE hKey, hKeyRoot;
00930 SQL_LIST *sql_list;
00931 
00932    /* insert SQL on bor, else update */
00933    insert = bor;
00934 
00935    /* determine primary key */
00936    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links BOR", &hKeyRoot);
00937    status = db_enum_link(hDB, hKeyRoot, 0, &hKey);
00938 
00939    /* if BOR list empty, take first one from EOR list */
00940    if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS) {
00941       insert = TRUE;
00942       db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links EOR", &hKeyRoot);
00943       status = db_enum_link(hDB, hKeyRoot, 0, &hKey);
00944       if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS) 
00945          return;
00946    }
00947 
00948    sql_get_columns(hKeyRoot, &sql_list);
00949    sprintf(where, "WHERE `%s`='%s'", sql_list[0].column_name, sql_list[0].data);
00950    free(sql_list);
00951 
00952    /* get BOR or EOR list */
00953    if (bor) {
00954       db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links BOR", &hKeyRoot);
00955       if (!hKeyRoot) {
00956          cm_msg(MERROR, "write_sql", "Cannot find \"/Logger/SQL/Links BOR");
00957          return;
00958       }
00959    } else {
00960       db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Links EOR", &hKeyRoot);
00961       if (!hKeyRoot) {
00962          cm_msg(MERROR, "write_sql", "Cannot find \"/Logger/SQL/Links EOR");
00963          return;
00964       }
00965    }
00966 
00967    size = sizeof(create_flag);
00968    create_flag = 0;
00969    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Create database", &create_flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00970 
00971    size = sizeof(write_flag);
00972    write_flag = 0;
00973    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Write data", &write_flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00974 
00975    size = sizeof(hostname);
00976    strcpy(hostname, "localhost");
00977    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Hostname", hostname, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00978 
00979    size = sizeof(username);
00980    strcpy(username, "root");
00981    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Username", username, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00982 
00983    size = sizeof(password);
00984    password[0] = 0;
00985    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Password", password, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00986 
00987    /* use experiment name as default database name */
00988    size = sizeof(database);
00989    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Name", database, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00990    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Database", database, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00991 
00992    size = sizeof(table);
00993    strcpy(table, "Runlog");
00994    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/SQL/Table", table, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00995 
00996    /* continue only if data should be written */
00997    if (!write_flag)
00998       return;
00999 
01000    /* connect to MySQL database */
01001    mysql_init(&db);
01002 
01003    if (!mysql_real_connect(&db, hostname, username, password, NULL, 0, NULL, 0)) {
01004        cm_msg(MERROR, "write_sql", "Failed to connect to database: Error: %s",              
01005               mysql_error(&db));
01006        mysql_close(&db);
01007        return;
01008    }
01009 
01010    /* select database */
01011    sprintf(query, "USE `%s`", database);
01012    if (mysql_query_debug(&db, query)) {
01013 
01014       /* create database if selected */
01015       if (create_flag) {
01016          if (!sql_create_database(&db, database)) {
01017             mysql_close(&db);
01018             return;
01019          }
01020 
01021       } else {
01022          cm_msg(MERROR, "write_sql", "Failed to select database: Error: %s",              
01023                mysql_error(&db));
01024          mysql_close(&db);
01025          return;
01026       }
01027    }
01028 
01029    if (insert) {
01030       status = sql_insert(&db, database, table, hKeyRoot, create_flag);
01031       if (status == ER_DUP_ENTRY)
01032          sql_update(&db, database, table, hKeyRoot, create_flag, where);
01033    } else
01034       sql_update(&db, database, table, hKeyRoot, create_flag, where);
01035 
01036    mysql_close(&db);
01037 }
01038 
01039 #endif // HAVE_MYSQL
01040 
01041 /*---- open tape and check for data --------------------------------*/
01042 
01043 INT tape_open(char *dev, INT * handle)
01044 {
01045    INT status, count;
01046    char buffer[16];
01047 
01048    status = ss_tape_open(dev, O_RDWR | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC, handle);
01049    if (status != SS_SUCCESS)
01050       return status;
01051 
01052    /* check if tape contains data */
01053    count = sizeof(buffer);
01054    status = ss_tape_read(*handle, buffer, &count);
01055 
01056    if (count == sizeof(buffer)) {
01057       /* tape contains data -> don't start */
01058       ss_tape_rskip(*handle, -1);
01059       cm_msg(MINFO, "tape_open",
01060              "Tape contains data, please spool tape with 'mtape seod'");
01061       cm_msg(MINFO, "tape_open",
01062              "or erase it with 'mtape weof', 'mtape rewind', then try again.");
01063       ss_tape_close(*handle);
01064       return SS_TAPE_ERROR;
01065    }
01066 
01067    return SS_SUCCESS;
01068 }
01069 
01070 /*---- open FTP channel --------------------------------------------*/
01071 
01072 INT ftp_error(char *message)
01073 {
01074    cm_msg(MERROR, "ftp_error", message);
01075    return 1;
01076 }
01077 
01078 INT ftp_open(char *destination, FTP_CON ** con)
01079 {
01080    INT status;
01081    short port = 0;
01082    char *token, host_name[HOST_NAME_LENGTH],
01083        user[32], pass[32], directory[256], file_name[256], file_mode[256];
01084 
01085    /*
01086       destination should have the form:
01087       host, port, user, password, directory, run%05d.mid
01088     */
01089 
01090    /* break destination in components */
01091    token = strtok(destination, ",");
01092    if (token)
01093       strcpy(host_name, token);
01094 
01095    token = strtok(NULL, ", ");
01096    if (token)
01097       port = atoi(token);
01098 
01099    token = strtok(NULL, ", ");
01100    if (token)
01101       strcpy(user, token);
01102 
01103    token = strtok(NULL, ", ");
01104    if (token)
01105       strcpy(pass, token);
01106 
01107    token = strtok(NULL, ", ");
01108    if (token)
01109       strcpy(directory, token);
01110 
01111    token = strtok(NULL, ", ");
01112    if (token)
01113       strcpy(file_name, token);
01114 
01115    token = strtok(NULL, ", ");
01116    file_mode[0] = 0;
01117    if (token)
01118       strcpy(file_mode, token);
01119 
01120 #ifdef FAL_MAIN
01121    ftp_debug(NULL, ftp_error);
01122 #else
01123    ftp_debug((int (*)(char *)) puts, ftp_error);
01124 #endif
01125 
01126    status = ftp_login(con, host_name, port, user, pass, "");
01127    if (status >= 0)
01128       return status;
01129 
01130    status = ftp_chdir(*con, directory);
01131    if (status >= 0)
01132       return status;
01133 
01134    status = ftp_binary(*con);
01135    if (status >= 0)
01136       return status;
01137 
01138    if (file_mode[0]) {
01139       status = ftp_command(*con, "umask %s", file_mode, 200, 250, EOF);
01140       if (status >= 0)
01141          return status;
01142    }
01143 
01144    if (ftp_open_write(*con, file_name) >= 0)
01145       return (*con)->err_no;
01146 
01147    return SS_SUCCESS;
01148 }
01149 
01150 /*---- MIDAS format routines ---------------------------------------*/
01151 
01152 INT midas_flush_buffer(LOG_CHN * log_chn)
01153 {
01154    INT status, size, written;
01155    MIDAS_INFO *info;
01156 
01157    info = (MIDAS_INFO *) log_chn->format_info;
01158    size = (INT) ((char *) info->write_pointer - (char *) info->buffer);
01159 
01160    if (size == 0)
01161       return SS_SUCCESS;
01162 
01163    /* write record to device */
01164    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE)
01165       status = ss_tape_write(log_chn->handle, info->buffer, size);
01166    else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP)
01167       status =
01168           ftp_send(((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con)->data, info->buffer,
01169                    size) == size ? SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01170    else {
01171 #ifdef OS_WINNT
01172       WriteFile((HANDLE) log_chn->handle, info->buffer, size, (unsigned long *) &written,
01173                 NULL);
01174 #else
01175       written = write(log_chn->handle, info->buffer, size);
01176 #endif
01177       status = written == size ? SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01178    }
01179 
01180    info->write_pointer = info->buffer;
01181 
01182    return status;
01183 }
01184 
01185 
01186 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01187 
01188 INT midas_write(LOG_CHN * log_chn, EVENT_HEADER * pevent, INT evt_size)
01189 {
01190    INT status, size_left;
01191    MIDAS_INFO *info;
01192 
01193    info = (MIDAS_INFO *) log_chn->format_info;
01194 
01195    /* check if event fits into buffer */
01196    size_left = TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE - (INT) ((char *) info->write_pointer - (char *) info->buffer);
01197 
01198    if (size_left < evt_size) {
01199       /* copy first part of event */
01200       memcpy(info->write_pointer, pevent, size_left);
01201       info->write_pointer += size_left;
01202 
01203       /* flush buffer */
01204       status = midas_flush_buffer(log_chn);
01205       if (status != SS_SUCCESS)
01206          return status;
01207 
01208       /* several writes for large events */
01209       while (evt_size - size_left >= TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE) {
01210          memcpy(info->buffer, (char *) pevent + size_left, TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE);
01211          info->write_pointer += TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE;
01212          size_left += TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE;
01213 
01214          status = midas_flush_buffer(log_chn);
01215          if (status != SS_SUCCESS)
01216             return status;
01217       }
01218 
01219       /* copy remaining part of event */
01220       memcpy(info->buffer, (char *) pevent + size_left, evt_size - size_left);
01221       info->write_pointer = info->buffer + (evt_size - size_left);
01222    } else {
01223       /* copy event to buffer */
01224       memcpy(info->write_pointer, pevent, evt_size);
01225       info->write_pointer += evt_size;
01226    }
01227 
01228    /* update statistics */
01229    log_chn->statistics.events_written++;
01230    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written += pevent->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER);
01231    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written_total += pevent->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER);
01232 
01233    return SS_SUCCESS;
01234 }
01235 
01236 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01237 
01238 INT midas_log_open(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
01239 {
01240    MIDAS_INFO *info;
01241    INT status;
01242 
01243    /* allocate MIDAS buffer info */
01244    log_chn->format_info = (void **) malloc(sizeof(MIDAS_INFO));
01245 
01246    info = (MIDAS_INFO *) log_chn->format_info;
01247    if (info == NULL) {
01248       log_chn->handle = 0;
01249       return SS_NO_MEMORY;
01250    }
01251 
01252    /* allocate full ring buffer for that channel */
01253    if ((info->buffer = (char *) malloc(TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE)) == NULL) {
01254       free(info);
01255       log_chn->handle = 0;
01256       return SS_NO_MEMORY;
01257    }
01258 
01259    info->write_pointer = info->buffer;
01260 
01261    /* Create device channel */
01262    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE) {
01263       status = tape_open(log_chn->path, &log_chn->handle);
01264       if (status != SS_SUCCESS) {
01265          free(info->buffer);
01266          free(info);
01267          log_chn->handle = 0;
01268          return status;
01269       }
01270    } else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP) {
01271       status = ftp_open(log_chn->path, (FTP_CON **) (&log_chn->ftp_con));
01272       if (status != SS_SUCCESS) {
01273          free(info->buffer);
01274          free(info);
01275          log_chn->handle = 0;
01276          return status;
01277       } else
01278          log_chn->handle = 1;
01279    } else {
01280       /* check if file exists */
01281       if (strstr(log_chn->path, "null") == NULL) {
01282          log_chn->handle = open(log_chn->path, O_RDONLY);
01283          if (log_chn->handle > 0) {
01284             /* check if file length is nonzero */
01285             if (lseek(log_chn->handle, 0, SEEK_END) > 0) {
01286                close(log_chn->handle);
01287                free(info->buffer);
01288                free(info);
01289                log_chn->handle = 0;
01290                return SS_FILE_EXISTS;
01291             }
01292          }
01293       }
01294 #ifdef OS_WINNT
01295       log_chn->handle =
01296           (int) CreateFile(log_chn->path, GENERIC_WRITE, FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL,
01297                            CREATE_ALWAYS,
01298                            FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL | FILE_FLAG_WRITE_THROUGH |
01299                            FILE_FLAG_SEQUENTIAL_SCAN, 0);
01300 
01301 #else
01302       log_chn->handle =
01303           open(log_chn->path, O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC | O_BINARY | O_LARGEFILE, 0644);
01304 #endif
01305 
01306       if (log_chn->handle < 0) {
01307          free(info->buffer);
01308          free(info);
01309          log_chn->handle = 0;
01310          return SS_FILE_ERROR;
01311       }
01312    }
01313 
01314    /* write ODB dump */
01315    if (log_chn->settings.odb_dump)
01316       log_odb_dump(log_chn, EVENTID_BOR, run_number);
01317 
01318    return SS_SUCCESS;
01319 }
01320 
01321 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01322 
01323 INT midas_log_close(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
01324 {
01325    /* write ODB dump */
01326    if (log_chn->settings.odb_dump)
01327       log_odb_dump(log_chn, EVENTID_EOR, run_number);
01328 
01329    midas_flush_buffer(log_chn);
01330 
01331    /* Write EOF if Tape */
01332    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE) {
01333       /* writing EOF mark on tape Fonly */
01334       ss_tape_write_eof(log_chn->handle);
01335       ss_tape_close(log_chn->handle);
01336    } else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP) {
01337       ftp_close((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con);
01338       ftp_bye((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con);
01339    } else
01340 #ifdef OS_WINNT
01341       CloseHandle((HANDLE) log_chn->handle);
01342 #else
01343       close(log_chn->handle);
01344 #endif
01345 
01346    free(((MIDAS_INFO *) log_chn->format_info)->buffer);
01347    free(log_chn->format_info);
01348 
01349    return SS_SUCCESS;
01350 }
01351 
01352 /*-- db_get_event_definition ---------------------------------------*/
01353 
01354 typedef struct {
01355    short int event_id;
01356    WORD format;
01357    HNDLE hDefKey;
01358 } EVENT_DEF;
01359 
01360 EVENT_DEF *db_get_event_definition(short int event_id)
01361 {
01362    INT i, index, status, size;
01363    char str[80];
01364    HNDLE hKey, hKeyRoot;
01365    WORD id;
01366 
01367 #define EVENT_DEF_CACHE_SIZE 30
01368    static EVENT_DEF *event_def = NULL;
01369 
01370    /* allocate memory for cache */
01371    if (event_def == NULL)
01372       event_def = (EVENT_DEF *) calloc(EVENT_DEF_CACHE_SIZE, sizeof(EVENT_DEF));
01373 
01374    /* lookup if event definition in cache */
01375    for (i = 0; event_def[i].event_id; i++)
01376       if (event_def[i].event_id == event_id)
01377          return &event_def[i];
01378 
01379    /* search free cache entry */
01380    for (index = 0; index < EVENT_DEF_CACHE_SIZE; index++)
01381       if (event_def[index].event_id == 0)
01382          break;
01383 
01384    if (index == EVENT_DEF_CACHE_SIZE) {
01385       cm_msg(MERROR, "db_get_event_definition", "too many event definitions");
01386       return NULL;
01387    }
01388 
01389    /* check for system events */
01390    if (event_id < 0) {
01391       event_def[index].event_id = event_id;
01392       event_def[index].format = FORMAT_ASCII;
01393       event_def[index].hDefKey = 0;
01394       return &event_def[index];
01395    }
01396 
01397    status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/equipment", &hKeyRoot);
01398    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
01399       cm_msg(MERROR, "db_get_event_definition", "cannot find /equipment entry in ODB");
01400       return NULL;
01401    }
01402 
01403    for (i = 0;; i++) {
01404       /* search for client with specific name */
01405       status = db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyRoot, i, &hKey);
01406       if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS) {
01407          sprintf(str, "Cannot find event id %d under /equipment", event_id);
01408          cm_msg(MERROR, "db_get_event_definition", str);
01409          return NULL;
01410       }
01411 
01412       size = sizeof(id);
01413       status = db_get_value(hDB, hKey, "Common/Event ID", &id, &size, TID_WORD, TRUE);
01414       if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
01415          continue;
01416 
01417       if (id == event_id) {
01418          /* set cache entry */
01419          event_def[index].event_id = id;
01420 
01421          size = sizeof(str);
01422          str[0] = 0;
01423          db_get_value(hDB, hKey, "Common/Format", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
01424 
01425          if (equal_ustring(str, "Fixed"))
01426             event_def[index].format = FORMAT_FIXED;
01427          else if (equal_ustring(str, "ASCII"))
01428             event_def[index].format = FORMAT_ASCII;
01429          else if (equal_ustring(str, "MIDAS"))
01430             event_def[index].format = FORMAT_MIDAS;
01431          else if (equal_ustring(str, "YBOS"))
01432             event_def[index].format = FORMAT_YBOS;
01433          else if (equal_ustring(str, "DUMP"))
01434             event_def[index].format = FORMAT_DUMP;
01435          else {
01436             cm_msg(MERROR, "db_get_event_definition", "unknown data format");
01437             event_def[index].event_id = 0;
01438             return NULL;
01439          }
01440 
01441          db_find_key(hDB, hKey, "Variables", &event_def[index].hDefKey);
01442          return &event_def[index];
01443       }
01444    }
01445 }
01446 
01447 /*---- DUMP format routines ----------------------------------------*/
01448 
01449 #define STR_INC(p,base) { p+=strlen(p); \
01450                           if (p > base+sizeof(base)) \
01451                             cm_msg(MERROR, "STR_INC", "ASCII buffer too small"); }
01452 
01453 
01454 INT dump_write(LOG_CHN * log_chn, EVENT_HEADER * pevent, INT evt_size)
01455 {
01456    INT status, size, i, j;
01457    EVENT_DEF *event_def;
01458    BANK_HEADER *pbh;
01459    BANK *pbk;
01460    BANK32 *pbk32;
01461    void *pdata;
01462    char buffer[100000], *pbuf, name[5], type_name[10];
01463    HNDLE hKey;
01464    KEY key;
01465    DWORD bkname;
01466    WORD bktype;
01467 
01468    event_def = db_get_event_definition(pevent->event_id);
01469    if (event_def == NULL)
01470       return SS_SUCCESS;
01471 
01472    /* write event header */
01473    pbuf = buffer;
01474    name[4] = 0;
01475 
01476    if (pevent->event_id == EVENTID_BOR)
01477       sprintf(pbuf, "%%ID BOR NR %ld\n", (long) pevent->serial_number);
01478    else if (pevent->event_id == EVENTID_EOR)
01479       sprintf(pbuf, "%%ID EOR NR %ld\n", (long) pevent->serial_number);
01480    else
01481       sprintf(pbuf, "%%ID %d TR %d NR %ld\n", pevent->event_id, pevent->trigger_mask,
01482               (long) pevent->serial_number);
01483    STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01484 
01485   /*---- MIDAS format ----------------------------------------------*/
01486    if (event_def->format == FORMAT_MIDAS) {
01487       LRS1882_DATA *lrs1882;
01488       LRS1877_DATA *lrs1877;
01489       LRS1877_HEADER *lrs1877_header;
01490 
01491       pbh = (BANK_HEADER *) (pevent + 1);
01492       bk_swap(pbh, FALSE);
01493 
01494       pbk = NULL;
01495       pbk32 = NULL;
01496       do {
01497          /* scan all banks */
01498          if (bk_is32(pbh)) {
01499             size = bk_iterate32(pbh, &pbk32, &pdata);
01500             if (pbk32 == NULL)
01501                break;
01502             bkname = *((DWORD *) pbk32->name);
01503             bktype = (WORD) pbk32->type;
01504          } else {
01505             size = bk_iterate(pbh, &pbk, &pdata);
01506             if (pbk == NULL)
01507                break;
01508             bkname = *((DWORD *) pbk->name);
01509             bktype = (WORD) pbk->type;
01510          }
01511 
01512          if (rpc_tid_size(bktype & 0xFF))
01513             size /= rpc_tid_size(bktype & 0xFF);
01514 
01515          lrs1882 = (LRS1882_DATA *) pdata;
01516          lrs1877 = (LRS1877_DATA *) pdata;
01517          lrs1877_header = (LRS1877_HEADER *) pdata;
01518 
01519          /* write bank header */
01520          *((DWORD *) name) = bkname;
01521 
01522          if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == 0)
01523             strcpy(type_name, rpc_tid_name(bktype & 0xFF));
01524          else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1882)
01525             strcpy(type_name, "LRS1882");
01526          else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1877)
01527             strcpy(type_name, "LRS1877");
01528          else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_PCOS3)
01529             strcpy(type_name, "PCOS3");
01530          else
01531             strcpy(type_name, "unknown");
01532 
01533          sprintf(pbuf, "BK %s TP %s SZ %d\n", name, type_name, size);
01534          STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01535 
01536          /* write data */
01537          for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
01538             if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == 0)
01539                db_sprintf(pbuf, pdata, size, i, bktype & 0xFF);
01540 
01541             else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1882)
01542                sprintf(pbuf, "GA %d CH %02d DA %d",
01543                        lrs1882[i].geo_addr, lrs1882[i].channel, lrs1882[i].data);
01544 
01545             else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1877) {
01546                if (i == 0)      /* header */
01547                   sprintf(pbuf, "GA %d BF %d CN %d",
01548                           lrs1877_header[i].geo_addr, lrs1877_header[i].buffer,
01549                           lrs1877_header[i].count);
01550                else             /* data */
01551                   sprintf(pbuf, "GA %d CH %02d ED %d DA %1.1lf",
01552                           lrs1877[i].geo_addr, lrs1877[i].channel, lrs1877[i].edge,
01553                           lrs1877[i].data * 0.5);
01554             }
01555 
01556             else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_PCOS3)
01557                *pbuf = '\0';
01558             else
01559                db_sprintf(pbuf, pdata, size, i, bktype & 0xFF);
01560 
01561             strcat(pbuf, "\n");
01562             STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01563          }
01564 
01565       } while (1);
01566    }
01567 
01568   /*---- FIXED format ----------------------------------------------*/
01569    if (event_def->format == FORMAT_FIXED) {
01570       if (event_def->hDefKey == 0)
01571          cm_msg(MERROR, "dump_write", "cannot find event definition");
01572       else {
01573          pdata = (char *) (pevent + 1);
01574          for (i = 0;; i++) {
01575             status = db_enum_key(hDB, event_def->hDefKey, i, &hKey);
01576             if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
01577                break;
01578 
01579             db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
01580             sprintf(pbuf, "%s\n", key.name);
01581             STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01582 
01583             /* adjust for alignment */
01584             pdata = (void *) VALIGN(pdata, MIN(ss_get_struct_align(), key.item_size));
01585 
01586             for (j = 0; j < key.num_values; j++) {
01587                db_sprintf(pbuf, pdata, key.item_size, j, key.type);
01588                strcat(pbuf, "\n");
01589                STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01590             }
01591 
01592             /* shift data pointer to next item */
01593             pdata = ((char *) pdata) + key.item_size * key.num_values;
01594          }
01595       }
01596    }
01597 
01598   /*---- ASCII format ----------------------------------------------*/
01599    if (event_def->format == FORMAT_ASCII) {
01600       /* write event header to device */
01601       size = strlen(buffer);
01602       if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE)
01603          status = ss_tape_write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size);
01604       else
01605          status = write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size) ==
01606              size ? SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01607 
01608       /* write event directly to device */
01609       size = strlen((char *) (pevent + 1));
01610       if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE)
01611          status = ss_tape_write(log_chn->handle, (char *) (pevent + 1), size);
01612       else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP)
01613          status = ftp_send(((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con)->data, buffer, size) == size ?
01614              SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01615       else
01616          status = write(log_chn->handle, (char *) (pevent + 1), size) ==
01617              size ? SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01618    } else {
01619       /* non-ascii format: only write buffer */
01620 
01621       /* insert empty line after each event */
01622       strcat(pbuf, "\n");
01623       size = strlen(buffer);
01624 
01625       /* write record to device */
01626       if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE)
01627          status = ss_tape_write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size);
01628       else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP)
01629          status = ftp_send(((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con)->data, buffer, size) == size ?
01630              SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01631       else
01632          status = write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size) ==
01633              size ? SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01634    }
01635 
01636    /* update statistics */
01637    log_chn->statistics.events_written++;
01638    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written += size;
01639    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written_total += size;
01640 
01641    return status;
01642 }
01643 
01644 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01645 
01646 INT dump_log_open(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
01647 {
01648    INT status;
01649 
01650    /* Create device channel */
01651    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE) {
01652       status = tape_open(log_chn->path, &log_chn->handle);
01653       if (status != SS_SUCCESS) {
01654          log_chn->handle = 0;
01655          return status;
01656       }
01657    } else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP) {
01658       status = ftp_open(log_chn->path, (FTP_CON **) (&log_chn->ftp_con));
01659       if (status != SS_SUCCESS) {
01660          log_chn->handle = 0;
01661          return status;
01662       } else
01663          log_chn->handle = 1;
01664    } else {
01665       log_chn->handle = open(log_chn->path, O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC | O_LARGEFILE, 0644);
01666 
01667       if (log_chn->handle < 0) {
01668          log_chn->handle = 0;
01669          return SS_FILE_ERROR;
01670       }
01671    }
01672 
01673    /* write ODB dump */
01674    if (log_chn->settings.odb_dump)
01675       log_odb_dump(log_chn, EVENTID_BOR, run_number);
01676 
01677    return SS_SUCCESS;
01678 }
01679 
01680 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01681 
01682 INT dump_log_close(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
01683 {
01684    /* write ODB dump */
01685    if (log_chn->settings.odb_dump)
01686       log_odb_dump(log_chn, EVENTID_EOR, run_number);
01687 
01688    /* Write EOF if Tape */
01689    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE) {
01690       /* writing EOF mark on tape only */
01691       ss_tape_write_eof(log_chn->handle);
01692       ss_tape_close(log_chn->handle);
01693    } else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP) {
01694       ftp_close((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con);
01695       ftp_bye((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con);
01696    } else
01697       close(log_chn->handle);
01698 
01699    return SS_SUCCESS;
01700 }
01701 
01702 /*---- ASCII format routines ---------------------------------------*/
01703 
01704 INT ascii_write(LOG_CHN * log_chn, EVENT_HEADER * pevent, INT evt_size)
01705 {
01706    INT status, size, i, j;
01707    EVENT_DEF *event_def;
01708    BANK_HEADER *pbh;
01709    BANK *pbk;
01710    BANK32 *pbk32;
01711    void *pdata;
01712    char buffer[10000], name[5], type_name[10];
01713    char *ph, header_line[10000];
01714    char *pd, data_line[10000];
01715    HNDLE hKey;
01716    KEY key;
01717    static short int last_event_id = -1;
01718    DWORD bkname;
01719    WORD bktype;
01720 
01721    if (pevent->serial_number == 1)
01722       last_event_id = -1;
01723 
01724    event_def = db_get_event_definition(pevent->event_id);
01725    if (event_def == NULL)
01726       return SS_SUCCESS;
01727 
01728    name[4] = 0;
01729    header_line[0] = 0;
01730    data_line[0] = 0;
01731    ph = header_line;
01732    pd = data_line;
01733 
01734   /*---- MIDAS format ----------------------------------------------*/
01735    if (event_def->format == FORMAT_MIDAS) {
01736       LRS1882_DATA *lrs1882;
01737       LRS1877_DATA *lrs1877;
01738       LRS1877_HEADER *lrs1877_header;
01739 
01740       pbh = (BANK_HEADER *) (pevent + 1);
01741       bk_swap(pbh, FALSE);
01742 
01743       pbk = NULL;
01744       pbk32 = NULL;
01745       do {
01746          /* scan all banks */
01747          if (bk_is32(pbh)) {
01748             size = bk_iterate32(pbh, &pbk32, &pdata);
01749             if (pbk32 == NULL)
01750                break;
01751             bkname = *((DWORD *) pbk32->name);
01752             bktype = (WORD) pbk32->type;
01753          } else {
01754             size = bk_iterate(pbh, &pbk, &pdata);
01755             if (pbk == NULL)
01756                break;
01757             bkname = *((DWORD *) pbk->name);
01758             bktype = (WORD) pbk->type;
01759          }
01760 
01761          if (rpc_tid_size(bktype & 0xFF))
01762             size /= rpc_tid_size(bktype & 0xFF);
01763 
01764          lrs1882 = (LRS1882_DATA *) pdata;
01765          lrs1877 = (LRS1877_DATA *) pdata;
01766          lrs1877_header = (LRS1877_HEADER *) pdata;
01767 
01768          /* write bank header */
01769          *((DWORD *) name) = bkname;
01770 
01771          if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == 0)
01772             strcpy(type_name, rpc_tid_name(bktype & 0xFF));
01773          else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1882)
01774             strcpy(type_name, "LRS1882");
01775          else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1877)
01776             strcpy(type_name, "LRS1877");
01777          else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_PCOS3)
01778             strcpy(type_name, "PCOS3");
01779          else
01780             strcpy(type_name, "unknown");
01781 
01782          sprintf(ph, "%s[%d]\t", name, size);
01783          STR_INC(ph, header_line);
01784 
01785          /* write data */
01786          for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
01787             db_sprintf(pd, pdata, size, i, bktype & 0xFF);
01788             strcat(pd, "\t");
01789             STR_INC(pd, data_line);
01790          }
01791 
01792       } while (1);
01793    }
01794 
01795   /*---- FIXED format ----------------------------------------------*/
01796    if (event_def->format == FORMAT_FIXED) {
01797       if (event_def->hDefKey == 0)
01798          cm_msg(MERROR, "ascii_write", "cannot find event definition");
01799       else {
01800          pdata = (char *) (pevent + 1);
01801          for (i = 0;; i++) {
01802             status = db_enum_key(hDB, event_def->hDefKey, i, &hKey);
01803             if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
01804                break;
01805 
01806             db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
01807 
01808             /* adjust for alignment */
01809             pdata = (void *) VALIGN(pdata, MIN(ss_get_struct_align(), key.item_size));
01810 
01811             for (j = 0; j < key.num_values; j++) {
01812                if (pevent->event_id != last_event_id) {
01813                   if (key.num_values == 1)
01814                      sprintf(ph, "%s\t", key.name);
01815                   else
01816                      sprintf(ph, "%s%d\t", key.name, j);
01817 
01818                   STR_INC(ph, header_line);
01819                }
01820 
01821                db_sprintf(pd, pdata, key.item_size, j, key.type);
01822                strcat(pd, "\t");
01823                STR_INC(pd, data_line);
01824             }
01825 
01826             /* shift data pointer to next item */
01827             pdata = ((char *) pdata) + key.item_size * key.num_values;
01828          }
01829       }
01830    }
01831 
01832    if (*(pd - 1) == '\t')
01833       *(pd - 1) = '\n';
01834 
01835    if (last_event_id != pevent->event_id) {
01836       if (*(ph - 1) == '\t')
01837          *(ph - 1) = '\n';
01838       last_event_id = pevent->event_id;
01839       strcpy(buffer, header_line);
01840       strcat(buffer, data_line);
01841    } else
01842       strcpy(buffer, data_line);
01843 
01844    /* write buffer to device */
01845    size = strlen(buffer);
01846 
01847    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE)
01848       status = ss_tape_write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size);
01849    else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP)
01850       status = ftp_send(((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con)->data, buffer, size) == size ?
01851           SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01852    else
01853       status = write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size) == size ? SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01854 
01855    /* update statistics */
01856    log_chn->statistics.events_written++;
01857    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written += size;
01858    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written_total += size;
01859 
01860    return status;
01861 }
01862 
01863 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01864 
01865 INT ascii_log_open(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
01866 {
01867    INT status;
01868    EVENT_HEADER event;
01869 
01870    /* Create device channel */
01871    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE) {
01872       status = tape_open(log_chn->path, &log_chn->handle);
01873       if (status != SS_SUCCESS) {
01874          log_chn->handle = 0;
01875          return status;
01876       }
01877    } else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP) {
01878       status = ftp_open(log_chn->path, (FTP_CON **) (&log_chn->ftp_con));
01879       if (status != SS_SUCCESS) {
01880          log_chn->handle = 0;
01881          return status;
01882       } else
01883          log_chn->handle = 1;
01884    } else {
01885       log_chn->handle = open(log_chn->path, O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC | O_LARGEFILE, 0644);
01886 
01887       if (log_chn->handle < 0) {
01888          log_chn->handle = 0;
01889          return SS_FILE_ERROR;
01890       }
01891    }
01892 
01893    /* write ODB dump */
01894    if (log_chn->settings.odb_dump) {
01895       event.event_id = EVENTID_BOR;
01896       event.data_size = 0;
01897       event.serial_number = run_number;
01898 
01899       ascii_write(log_chn, &event, sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
01900    }
01901 
01902    return SS_SUCCESS;
01903 }
01904 
01905 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01906 
01907 INT ascii_log_close(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
01908 {
01909    /* Write EOF if Tape */
01910    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE) {
01911       /* writing EOF mark on tape only */
01912       ss_tape_write_eof(log_chn->handle);
01913       ss_tape_close(log_chn->handle);
01914    } else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP) {
01915       ftp_close((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con);
01916       ftp_bye((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con);
01917    } else
01918       close(log_chn->handle);
01919 
01920    return SS_SUCCESS;
01921 }
01922 
01923 /*---- ROOT format routines ----------------------------------------*/
01924 
01925 #ifdef HAVE_ROOT
01926 
01927 #define MAX_BANKS 100
01928 
01929 typedef struct {
01930    int event_id;
01931    TTree *tree;
01932    int n_branch;
01933    DWORD branch_name[MAX_BANKS];
01934    int branch_filled[MAX_BANKS];
01935    int branch_len[MAX_BANKS];
01936    TBranch *branch[MAX_BANKS];
01937 } EVENT_TREE;
01938 
01939 typedef struct {
01940    TFile *f;
01941    int n_tree;
01942    EVENT_TREE *event_tree;
01943 } TREE_STRUCT;
01944 
01945 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01946 
01947 INT root_book_trees(TREE_STRUCT * tree_struct)
01948 {
01949    int index, size, status;
01950    WORD id;
01951    char str[1000];
01952    HNDLE hKeyRoot, hKeyEq;
01953    KEY eqkey;
01954    EVENT_TREE *et;
01955 
01956    status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Equipment", &hKeyRoot);
01957    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
01958       cm_msg(MERROR, "root_book_trees", "cannot find \"/Equipment\" entry in ODB");
01959       return 0;
01960    }
01961 
01962    tree_struct->n_tree = 0;
01963 
01964    for (index = 0;; index++) {
01965       /* loop through all events under /Equipment */
01966       status = db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyRoot, index, &hKeyEq);
01967       if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
01968          return 1;
01969 
01970       db_get_key(hDB, hKeyEq, &eqkey);
01971 
01972       /* create tree */
01973       tree_struct->n_tree++;
01974       if (tree_struct->n_tree == 1)
01975          tree_struct->event_tree = (EVENT_TREE *) malloc(sizeof(EVENT_TREE));
01976       else
01977          tree_struct->event_tree =
01978              (EVENT_TREE *) realloc(tree_struct->event_tree,
01979                                     sizeof(EVENT_TREE) * tree_struct->n_tree);
01980 
01981       et = tree_struct->event_tree + (tree_struct->n_tree - 1);
01982 
01983       size = sizeof(id);
01984       status = db_get_value(hDB, hKeyEq, "Common/Event ID", &id, &size, TID_WORD, TRUE);
01985       if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
01986          continue;
01987 
01988       et->event_id = id;
01989       et->n_branch = 0;
01990 
01991       /* check format */
01992       size = sizeof(str);
01993       str[0] = 0;
01994       db_get_value(hDB, hKeyEq, "Common/Format", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
01995 
01996       if (!equal_ustring(str, "MIDAS")) {
01997          cm_msg(MERROR, "root_book_events",
01998                 "ROOT output only for MIDAS events, but %s in %s format", eqkey.name,
01999                 str);
02000          return 0;
02001       }
02002 
02003       /* create tree */
02004       sprintf(str, "Event \"%s\", ID %d", eqkey.name, id);
02005       et->tree = new TTree(eqkey.name, str);
02006    }
02007 
02008    return 1;
02009 }
02010 
02011 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02012 
02013 INT root_book_bank(EVENT_TREE * et, HNDLE hKeyDef, int event_id, char *bank_name)
02014 {
02015    int i, status;
02016    char str[1000];
02017    HNDLE hKeyVar, hKeySubVar;
02018    KEY varkey, subvarkey;
02019 
02020    /* find definition of bank */
02021    status = db_find_key(hDB, hKeyDef, bank_name, &hKeyVar);
02022    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
02023       cm_msg(MERROR, "root_book_bank", "received unknown bank \"%s\" in event #%d",
02024              bank_name, event_id);
02025       return 0;
02026    }
02027 
02028    if (et->n_branch + 1 == MAX_BANKS) {
02029       cm_msg(MERROR, "root_book_bank", "max number of banks (%d) exceeded in event #%d",
02030              MAX_BANKS, event_id);
02031       return 0;
02032    }
02033 
02034    db_get_key(hDB, hKeyVar, &varkey);
02035 
02036    if (varkey.type != TID_KEY) {
02037       /* book variable length array size */
02038 
02039       sprintf(str, "n%s/I:%s[n%s]/", varkey.name, varkey.name, varkey.name);
02040 
02041       switch (varkey.type) {
02042       case TID_BYTE:
02043       case TID_CHAR:
02044          strcat(str, "b");
02045          break;
02046       case TID_SBYTE:
02047          strcat(str, "B");
02048          break;
02049       case TID_WORD:
02050          strcat(str, "s");
02051          break;
02052       case TID_SHORT:
02053          strcat(str, "S");
02054          break;
02055       case TID_DWORD:
02056          strcat(str, "i");
02057          break;
02058       case TID_INT:
02059          strcat(str, "I");
02060          break;
02061       case TID_BOOL:
02062          strcat(str, "I");
02063          break;
02064       case TID_FLOAT:
02065          strcat(str, "F");
02066          break;
02067       case TID_DOUBLE:
02068          strcat(str, "D");
02069          break;
02070       case TID_STRING:
02071          strcat(str, "C");
02072          break;
02073       }
02074 
02075       et->branch[et->n_branch] = et->tree->Branch(bank_name, NULL, str);
02076       et->branch_name[et->n_branch] = *(DWORD *) bank_name;
02077       et->n_branch++;
02078    } else {
02079       /* book structured bank */
02080       str[0] = 0;
02081 
02082       for (i = 0;; i++) {
02083          /* loop through bank variables */
02084          status = db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyVar, i, &hKeySubVar);
02085          if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
02086             break;
02087 
02088          db_get_key(hDB, hKeySubVar, &subvarkey);
02089 
02090          if (i != 0)
02091             strcat(str, ":");
02092          strcat(str, subvarkey.name);
02093          strcat(str, "/");
02094          switch (subvarkey.type) {
02095          case TID_BYTE:
02096          case TID_CHAR:
02097             strcat(str, "b");
02098             break;
02099          case TID_SBYTE:
02100             strcat(str, "B");
02101             break;
02102          case TID_WORD:
02103             strcat(str, "s");
02104             break;
02105          case TID_SHORT:
02106             strcat(str, "S");
02107             break;
02108          case TID_DWORD:
02109             strcat(str, "i");
02110             break;
02111          case TID_INT:
02112             strcat(str, "I");
02113             break;
02114          case TID_BOOL:
02115             strcat(str, "I");
02116             break;
02117          case TID_FLOAT:
02118             strcat(str, "F");
02119             break;
02120          case TID_DOUBLE:
02121             strcat(str, "D");
02122             break;
02123          case TID_STRING:
02124             strcat(str, "C");
02125             break;
02126          }
02127       }
02128 
02129       et->branch[et->n_branch] = et->tree->Branch(bank_name, NULL, str);
02130       et->branch_name[et->n_branch] = *(DWORD *) bank_name;
02131       et->n_branch++;
02132    }
02133 
02134    return 1;
02135 }
02136 
02137 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02138 
02139 INT root_write(LOG_CHN * log_chn, EVENT_HEADER * pevent, INT evt_size)
02140 {
02141    INT size, i;
02142    char bank_name[32];
02143    EVENT_DEF *event_def;
02144    BANK_HEADER *pbh;
02145    void *pdata;
02146    static short int last_event_id = -1;
02147    TREE_STRUCT *ts;
02148    EVENT_TREE *et;
02149    BANK *pbk;
02150    BANK32 *pbk32;
02151    DWORD bklen;
02152    DWORD bkname;
02153    WORD bktype;
02154    TBranch *branch;
02155 
02156    if (pevent->serial_number == 1)
02157       last_event_id = -1;
02158 
02159    event_def = db_get_event_definition(pevent->event_id);
02160    if (event_def == NULL) {
02161       cm_msg(MERROR, "root_write", "Definition for event #%d not found under /Equipment",
02162              pevent->event_id);
02163       return SS_INVALID_FORMAT;
02164    }
02165 
02166    ts = (TREE_STRUCT *) log_chn->format_info;
02167 
02168    size = (INT) ts->f->GetBytesWritten();
02169 
02170   /*---- MIDAS format ----------------------------------------------*/
02171 
02172    if (event_def->format == FORMAT_MIDAS) {
02173       pbh = (BANK_HEADER *) (pevent + 1);
02174       bk_swap(pbh, FALSE);
02175 
02176       /* find event in tree structure */
02177       for (i = 0; i < ts->n_tree; i++)
02178          if (ts->event_tree[i].event_id == pevent->event_id)
02179             break;
02180 
02181       if (i == ts->n_tree) {
02182          cm_msg(MERROR, "root_write", "Event #%d not booked by root_book_events()",
02183                 pevent->event_id);
02184          return SS_INVALID_FORMAT;
02185       }
02186 
02187       et = ts->event_tree + i;
02188 
02189       /* first mark all banks non-filled */
02190       for (i = 0; i < et->n_branch; i++)
02191          et->branch_filled[i] = FALSE;
02192 
02193       /* go thourgh all banks and set the address */
02194       pbk = NULL;
02195       pbk32 = NULL;
02196       do {
02197          /* scan all banks */
02198          if (bk_is32(pbh)) {
02199             bklen = bk_iterate32(pbh, &pbk32, &pdata);
02200             if (pbk32 == NULL)
02201                break;
02202             bkname = *((DWORD *) pbk32->name);
02203             bktype = (WORD) pbk32->type;
02204          } else {
02205             bklen = bk_iterate(pbh, &pbk, &pdata);
02206             if (pbk == NULL)
02207                break;
02208             bkname = *((DWORD *) pbk->name);
02209             bktype = (WORD) pbk->type;
02210          }
02211 
02212          if (rpc_tid_size(bktype & 0xFF))
02213             bklen /= rpc_tid_size(bktype & 0xFF);
02214 
02215          *((DWORD *) bank_name) = bkname;
02216          bank_name[4] = 0;
02217 
02218          for (i = 0; i < et->n_branch; i++)
02219             if (et->branch_name[i] == bkname)
02220                break;
02221 
02222          if (i == et->n_branch)
02223             root_book_bank(et, event_def->hDefKey, pevent->event_id, bank_name);
02224 
02225          branch = et->branch[i];
02226          et->branch_filled[i] = TRUE;
02227          et->branch_len[i] = bklen;
02228 
02229          if (bktype != TID_STRUCT) {
02230             TIter next(branch->GetListOfLeaves());
02231             TLeaf *leaf = (TLeaf *) next();
02232 
02233             /* varibale length array */
02234             leaf->SetAddress(&et->branch_len[i]);
02235 
02236             leaf = (TLeaf *) next();
02237             leaf->SetAddress(pdata);
02238          } else {
02239             /* structured bank */
02240             branch->SetAddress(pdata);
02241          }
02242 
02243       } while (1);
02244 
02245       /* check if all branches have been filled */
02246       for (i = 0; i < et->n_branch; i++)
02247          if (!et->branch_filled[i])
02248             cm_msg(MERROR, "root_write",
02249                    "Bank %s booked but not received, tree cannot be filled", bank_name);
02250 
02251       /* fill tree */
02252       et->tree->Fill();
02253    }
02254 
02255    size = (INT) ts->f->GetBytesWritten() - size;
02256 
02257    /* update statistics */
02258    log_chn->statistics.events_written++;
02259    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written += size;
02260    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written_total += size;
02261 
02262    return SS_SUCCESS;
02263 }
02264 
02265 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02266 
02267 INT root_log_open(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
02268 {
02269    INT size, level;
02270    char str[256], name[256];
02271    EVENT_HEADER event;
02272    TREE_STRUCT *tree_struct;
02273 
02274    /* Create device channel */
02275    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE || log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP) {
02276       cm_msg(MERROR, "root_log_open", "ROOT files can only reside on disk");
02277       log_chn->handle = 0;
02278       return -1;
02279    } else {
02280       /* check if file exists */
02281       if (strstr(log_chn->path, "null") == NULL) {
02282          log_chn->handle = open(log_chn->path, O_RDONLY);
02283          if (log_chn->handle > 0) {
02284             /* check if file length is nonzero */
02285             if (lseek(log_chn->handle, 0, SEEK_END) > 0) {
02286                close(log_chn->handle);
02287                log_chn->handle = 0;
02288                return SS_FILE_EXISTS;
02289             }
02290          }
02291       }
02292 
02293       name[0] = 0;
02294       size = sizeof(name);
02295       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Name", name, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
02296 
02297       sprintf(str, "MIDAS exp. %s, run #%d", name, run_number);
02298 
02299       TFile *f = new TFile(log_chn->path, "create", str, 1);
02300       if (!f->IsOpen()) {
02301          delete f;
02302          log_chn->handle = 0;
02303          return SS_FILE_ERROR;
02304       }
02305       log_chn->handle = 1;
02306 
02307       /* set compression level */
02308       level = 0;
02309       size = sizeof(level);
02310       db_get_value(hDB, log_chn->settings_hkey, "Compression", &level, &size, TID_INT,
02311                    FALSE);
02312       f->SetCompressionLevel(level);
02313 
02314       /* create root structure with trees and branches */
02315       tree_struct = (TREE_STRUCT *) malloc(sizeof(TREE_STRUCT));
02316       tree_struct->f = f;
02317 
02318       /* book event tree */
02319       root_book_trees(tree_struct);
02320 
02321       /* store file object in format_info */
02322       log_chn->format_info = (void **) tree_struct;
02323    }
02324 
02325    /* write ODB dump */
02326    if (log_chn->settings.odb_dump) {
02327       event.event_id = EVENTID_BOR;
02328       event.data_size = 0;
02329       event.serial_number = run_number;
02330 
02331       //##root_write(log_chn, &event, sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
02332    }
02333 
02334    return SS_SUCCESS;
02335 }
02336 
02337 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02338 
02339 INT root_log_close(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
02340 {
02341    TREE_STRUCT *ts;
02342 
02343    ts = (TREE_STRUCT *) log_chn->format_info;
02344 
02345    /* flush and close file */
02346    ts->f->Write();
02347    ts->f->Close();
02348    delete ts->f;                // deletes also all trees and branches!
02349 
02350    /* delete event tree */
02351    free(ts->event_tree);
02352    free(ts);
02353 
02354    log_chn->format_info = NULL;
02355 
02356    return SS_SUCCESS;
02357 }
02358 
02359 #endif                          /* HAVE_ROOT */
02360 
02361 /*---- log_open ----------------------------------------------------*/
02362 
02363 INT log_open(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
02364 {
02365    INT status;
02366 
02367    if (equal_ustring(log_chn->settings.format, "YBOS")) {
02368       log_chn->format = FORMAT_YBOS;
02369       status = ybos_log_open(log_chn, run_number);
02370    } else if (equal_ustring(log_chn->settings.format, "ASCII")) {
02371       log_chn->format = FORMAT_ASCII;
02372       status = ascii_log_open(log_chn, run_number);
02373    } else if (equal_ustring(log_chn->settings.format, "DUMP")) {
02374       log_chn->format = FORMAT_DUMP;
02375       status = dump_log_open(log_chn, run_number);
02376    } else if (equal_ustring(log_chn->settings.format, "ROOT")) {
02377 #ifdef HAVE_ROOT
02378       log_chn->format = FORMAT_ROOT;
02379       status = root_log_open(log_chn, run_number);
02380 #else
02381       return SS_NO_ROOT;
02382 #endif
02383    } else if (equal_ustring(log_chn->settings.format, "MIDAS")) {
02384       log_chn->format = FORMAT_MIDAS;
02385       status = midas_log_open(log_chn, run_number);
02386    } else
02387       return SS_INVALID_FORMAT;
02388 
02389    return status;
02390 }
02391 
02392 /*---- log_close ---------------------------------------------------*/
02393 
02394 INT log_close(LOG_CHN * log_chn, INT run_number)
02395 {
02396    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_YBOS)
02397       ybos_log_close(log_chn, run_number);
02398 
02399    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_ASCII)
02400       ascii_log_close(log_chn, run_number);
02401 
02402    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_DUMP)
02403       dump_log_close(log_chn, run_number);
02404 
02405 #ifdef HAVE_ROOT
02406    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_ROOT)
02407       root_log_close(log_chn, run_number);
02408 #endif
02409 
02410    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_MIDAS)
02411       midas_log_close(log_chn, run_number);
02412 
02413    log_chn->statistics.files_written++;
02414    log_chn->handle = 0;
02415    log_chn->ftp_con = NULL;
02416 
02417    return SS_SUCCESS;
02418 }
02419 
02420 /*---- log_write ---------------------------------------------------*/
02421 
02422 INT log_write(LOG_CHN * log_chn, EVENT_HEADER * pevent)
02423 {
02424    INT status = 0, size, izero;
02425    DWORD actual_time, start_time, watchdog_timeout;
02426    BOOL watchdog_flag, flag;
02427    static BOOL stop_requested = FALSE;
02428    static DWORD last_checked = 0;
02429    HNDLE htape, stats_hkey;
02430    char tape_name[256];
02431    double dzero;
02432 
02433    start_time = ss_millitime();
02434 
02435    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_YBOS)
02436       status = ybos_write(log_chn, pevent, pevent->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
02437 
02438    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_ASCII)
02439       status = ascii_write(log_chn, pevent, pevent->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
02440 
02441    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_DUMP)
02442       status = dump_write(log_chn, pevent, pevent->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
02443 
02444    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_MIDAS)
02445       status = midas_write(log_chn, pevent, pevent->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
02446 
02447 #ifdef HAVE_ROOT
02448    if (log_chn->format == FORMAT_ROOT)
02449       status = root_write(log_chn, pevent, pevent->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
02450 #endif
02451 
02452    actual_time = ss_millitime();
02453    if ((int) actual_time - (int) start_time > 3000)
02454       cm_msg(MINFO, "log_write", "Write operation took %d ms", actual_time - start_time);
02455 
02456    if (status != SS_SUCCESS && !stop_requested) {
02457       if (status == SS_IO_ERROR)
02458          cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "Physical IO error on %s, stopping run",
02459                 log_chn->path);
02460       else
02461          cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "Error writing to %s, stopping run", log_chn->path);
02462 
02463       stop_requested = TRUE;
02464       cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02465       stop_requested = FALSE;
02466 
02467       return status;
02468    }
02469 
02470    /* check if event limit is reached */
02471    if (!stop_requested && !in_stop_transition &&
02472        log_chn->settings.event_limit > 0 &&
02473        log_chn->statistics.events_written >= log_chn->settings.event_limit) {
02474       stop_requested = TRUE;
02475 
02476       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "stopping run after having received %d events",
02477              log_chn->settings.event_limit);
02478 
02479       status = cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02480       if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02481          cm_msg(MERROR, "log_write", "cannot stop run after reaching event limit");
02482       stop_requested = FALSE;
02483 
02484       /* check if autorestart, main loop will take care of it */
02485       size = sizeof(BOOL);
02486       flag = FALSE;
02487       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Auto restart", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
02488 
02489       if (flag)
02490          auto_restart = ss_time() + 5; /* start in 5 sec. */
02491 
02492       return status;
02493    }
02494 
02495    /* check if byte limit is reached */
02496    if (!stop_requested && !in_stop_transition &&
02497        log_chn->settings.byte_limit > 0 &&
02498        log_chn->statistics.bytes_written >= log_chn->settings.byte_limit) {
02499       stop_requested = TRUE;
02500 
02501       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "stopping run after having received %1.0lf mega bytes",
02502              log_chn->statistics.bytes_written / 1E6);
02503 
02504       status = cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02505       if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02506          cm_msg(MERROR, "log_write", "cannot stop run after reaching bytes limit");
02507       stop_requested = FALSE;
02508 
02509       /* check if autorestart, main loop will take care of it */
02510       size = sizeof(BOOL);
02511       flag = FALSE;
02512       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Auto restart", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
02513 
02514       if (flag)
02515          auto_restart = ss_time() + 5; /* start in 5 sec. */
02516 
02517       return status;
02518    }
02519 
02520    /* check if capacity is reached for tapes */
02521    if (!stop_requested && !in_stop_transition &&
02522        log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE &&
02523        log_chn->settings.tape_capacity > 0 &&
02524        log_chn->statistics.bytes_written_total >= log_chn->settings.tape_capacity) {
02525       stop_requested = TRUE;
02526       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "tape capacity reached, stopping run");
02527 
02528       /* remember tape name */
02529       strcpy(tape_name, log_chn->path);
02530       stats_hkey = log_chn->stats_hkey;
02531 
02532       status = cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02533       if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02534          cm_msg(MERROR, "log_write", "cannot stop run after reaching tape capacity");
02535       stop_requested = FALSE;
02536 
02537       /* rewind tape */
02538       ss_tape_open(tape_name, O_RDONLY, &htape);
02539       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "rewinding tape %s, please wait", log_chn->path);
02540 
02541       cm_get_watchdog_params(&watchdog_flag, &watchdog_timeout);
02542       cm_set_watchdog_params(watchdog_flag, 300000);    /* 5 min for tape rewind */
02543       ss_tape_unmount(htape);
02544       ss_tape_close(htape);
02545       cm_set_watchdog_params(watchdog_flag, watchdog_timeout);
02546 
02547       /* zero statistics */
02548       dzero = izero = 0;
02549       db_set_value(hDB, stats_hkey, "Bytes written total", &dzero,
02550                    sizeof(dzero), 1, TID_DOUBLE);
02551       db_set_value(hDB, stats_hkey, "Files written", &izero, sizeof(izero), 1, TID_INT);
02552 
02553       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "Please insert new tape and start new run.");
02554 
02555       return status;
02556    }
02557 
02558    /* stop run if less than 10MB free disk space */
02559    actual_time = ss_millitime();
02560    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_DISK && actual_time - last_checked > 1000) {
02561       last_checked = actual_time;
02562 
02563       if (ss_disk_free(log_chn->path) < 1E7 && !stop_requested && !in_stop_transition) {
02564          stop_requested = TRUE;
02565          cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "disk nearly full, stopping run");
02566 
02567          status = cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02568          if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02569             cm_msg(MERROR, "log_write", "cannot stop run after reaching byte limit");
02570          stop_requested = FALSE;
02571       }
02572    }
02573 
02574    return status;
02575 }
02576 
02577 /*---- open_history ------------------------------------------------*/
02578 
02579 void log_history(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hKey, void *info);
02580 
02581 INT open_history()
02582 {
02583    INT size, index, i_tag, status, i, j, li, max_event_id;
02584    INT n_var, n_tags, n_names = 0;
02585    HNDLE hKeyRoot, hKeyVar, hKeyNames, hLinkKey, hVarKey, hKeyEq, hHistKey, hKey;
02586    DWORD history;
02587    TAG *tag;
02588    KEY key, varkey, linkkey, histkey;
02589    WORD event_id;
02590    char str[256], eq_name[NAME_LENGTH], hist_name[NAME_LENGTH];
02591    BOOL single_names;
02592 
02593    /* set direcotry for history files */
02594    size = sizeof(str);
02595    str[0] = 0;
02596    status = db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/History Dir", str, &size, TID_STRING, FALSE);
02597    if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
02598       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Data Dir", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
02599 
02600    if (str[0] != 0)
02601       hs_set_path(str);
02602 
02603    if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/History/Links", &hKeyRoot) != DB_SUCCESS ||
02604        db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/History/Links/System", &hKeyRoot) != DB_SUCCESS) {
02605       /* create default history keys */
02606       db_create_key(hDB, 0, "/History/Links", TID_KEY);
02607
